summary: In mid-'80s Romania, a gifted mathematician is under investigation for plans to publish a new theorem by smuggling it overseas.
cast: Sorin Leoveanu|Ofelia Popii|Florin Piersic Jr.|Virgil Ogasanu|Tora Vasilescu|Marc Titieni|Dorian Boguta|Alina Berzunteanu|Lucian Ifrim|George Alexandru|Adelaida Zamfira|Paul Ipate|Mihai Calin|Dan Tudor|Medeea Marinescu|Razvan Popa|Adina Cristescu|Ana Popescu|Marius Dragus|Lidia Zinca|Puiu Mircea Lascus|Marta Marinescu
title: Quod erat demonstrandum
